about.description:
Given a byte stream with a minimum length of 50 bytes TLSH generates a
hash value which can be used for similarity comparisons. Similar objects
will have similar hash values which allows for the detection of similar
objects by comparing their hash values. Note that the byte stream should
have a sufficient amount of complexity. For example, a byte stream of
identical bytes will not generate a hash value.
about.summary: TLSH is a fuzzy matching library.

name: tlsh-tools
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.19.2
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: tlsh-tools
    version: 4.2.1
source:
    patches:
        - make.patch
    sha256: ef90e81a5a400a7bc3074f126c133b88f19820a09ead8d457c2aacd4669178ba
    url: https://github.com/trendmicro/tlsh/archive/4.2.1.tar.gz
build:
    number: 0
    run_exports:
        - libtlsh >=4.2.1,<4.3.0a0
    string: he1b5a44_0
requirements:
    build:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 0_gnu
        - binutils_impl_linux-64 2.34 h53a641e_5
        - binutils_linux-64 2.34 hc952b39_20
        - bzip2 1.0.8 h516909a_2
        - ca-certificates 2020.4.5.2 hecda079_0
        - cmake 3.17.0 h28c56e5_0
        - expat 2.2.9 he1b5a44_2
        - gcc_impl_linux-64 7.5.0 hd420e75_6
        - gcc_linux-64 7.5.0 h09487f9_20
        - gxx_impl_linux-64 7.5.0 hdf63c60_6
        - gxx_linux-64 7.5.0 h09487f9_20
        - krb5 1.17.1 h2fd8d38_0
        - ld_impl_linux-64 2.34 h53a641e_5
        - libcurl 7.69.1 hf7181ac_0
        - libedit 3.1.20191231 h46ee950_0
        - libgcc-ng 9.2.0 h24d8f2e_2
        - libgomp 9.2.0 h24d8f2e_2
        - libssh2 1.9.0 hab1572f_2
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.2.0 hdf63c60_2
        - libuv 1.38.0 h516909a_0
        - make 4.3 h516909a_0
        - ncurses 6.1 hf484d3e_1002
        - openssl 1.1.1g h516909a_0
        - rhash 1.3.6 h14c3975_1001
        - tk 8.6.10 hed695b0_0
        - xz 5.2.5 h516909a_0
        - zlib 1.2.11 h516909a_1006
    host:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 0_gnu
        - libgcc-ng 9.2.0 h24d8f2e_2
        - libgomp 9.2.0 h24d8f2e_2
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.2.0 hdf63c60_2
        - libtlsh 4.2.1 he1b5a44_0
    run:
        - libgcc-ng >=7.5.0
        - libstdcxx-ng >=7.5.0
        - libtlsh 4.2.1 he1b5a44_0
test:
    commands:
        - tlsh --help
        - tlsh_unittest --help
about:
    description: 'Given a byte stream with a minimum length of 50 bytes TLSH generates
        a

        hash value which can be used for similarity comparisons. Similar objects

        will have similar hash values which allows for the detection of similar

        objects by comparing their hash values. Note that the byte stream should

        have a sufficient amount of complexity. For example, a byte stream of

        identical bytes will not generate a hash value.

        '
    home: https://github.com/trendmicro/tlsh
    license: Apache-2.0
    license_family: Apache
    license_file: LICENSE
    summary: TLSH is a fuzzy matching library.
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - bollwyvl
